Name: Hurricane (by Chris McMillian)
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Hurricane glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & cherry.
Review: A veritable tropical fruit salad laced with rum.
History: Adapted from a 2006 recipe by Chris McMillian, New Orleans, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Hurricane (by Chris McMillian) contains 311 calories
